originalText.text: Rob has been my coach for nine years, helping me book and prepare for roles on projects such as Boardwalk Empire (HBO), Red Oaks (Amazon) and Paterno (HBO). Preparing for auditions or jobs with Rob (be it in studio or online) gives me the edge to feel confident in my instrument. I never feel more at ease in a creative/professional setting than when I have worked with Rob beforehand. My first class I was delighted to see that I was the most unsuccessful actor in the room, professionally. Everyone in the class was working. It’s a reflection of the students Rob’s intelligence attracts as well as a testament to what he’s capable to do for you. Rob’s guidance has allowed me to level up in the industry at a much faster pace than I would have without him.

originalText.text: I always try to work with Rob before an audition. I feel much better prepared and Rob gets me out of my own head and out of my own way and having a lot more fun and owning my uniqueness that I bring to roles in front of the camera. And when he helped me book a role on The Plot Against America, we then prepared the role, so that I felt 100% confident on set with Zoe Kazan. Highly recommended."

originalText.text: This class is absolutely amazing! When I started Celia's class 3 years ago, I had 0 experience and wasn't sure where to go next with this craft. Thanks to her dedication and guidance, I have all the tools I need to move confidently through the acting world. This has also continued during the quarentine! Celia has taken all of the aspects of in person coaching to zoom, which I'm extremely thankful for. The classes are kept small to ensure everyone has time for individual coaching and also promotes such a wonderful community and bond with the other actors present. Along with coaching, Celia has also given us great tips on how to transition our skills from in person performances to the new digital medium we're all adjusting to. I feel way more secure with my self tapes and at home set up thanks to this class. Overall, it's been such a fantastic experience. I've not only become a much stronger actor, but a more confident and self assured person all around!

originalText.text: How can I say enough good things about McCaskill Studio?? I have been studying with Celia for 2 years now, and have grown so much as an artist and actor. Recently, The Actor's Toolbox moved online and it has been a lifesaver for me during shelter-in-place. The online format works wonderfully for preparing the actor to work on film, as well as to audition virtually. Celia has kept all the magic of in-person classes and added training for working not only on camera, but in Zoom as well. The small class size ensure every student gets plenty of time and attention. Celia gives brilliant feedback, and I see my classmates grow leaps and bounds each class. There is also a beautiful community aspect to the class, where we support and learn from each other. I would truly recommend this class to anyone!

originalText.text: I have been working with Rob for 13 years. His insight and intuition in working with actors is remarkable. Most recently Rob has helped me prepare rolls on FBI: Most Wanted, Hightown, and New Amsterdam. I felt so comfortable on set because of the work he and I did together.  He brings you to another level in your craft, in your confidence, and in your ability to play at a professional level.
